pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.8: Vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ refer respectively to the anus and the genitals.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.3: There are no instructions in the Pali or in the commentaries for how the expansion here or below is to be done. I therefore assume it is to be done in accordance with the previous rule.
